TopicTitle: I want to convert my Career-mode save into a Science-mode save

Articles.Content:
In the 0.24 update, Career-mode saves are now different and use Funds. As much as I love the "new" mode, I really want to keep my Science-based universe away from those pesky Funds. Is there a realistic method of converting a 0.24 Career-mode save to a Science-mode save?

Edited July 18, 2014 by YamnSpace
I am unsure about the rules of bumping, but I want to make sure if save-mode conversion is possible and, if so, how it is possible.
Yes there is. Please look here.

So many of the same question.

Answered by AlexinTokyo anyway, so to prevent clutter...
